LanguageData.CookMealSalad.label: cook fruit salad
LanguageData.CookMealSalad.description: Prepares a fruit salad made from raw fruits. \n\n产出：1.

LanguageData.CookMealSalad_Bulk.description: Prepares fruit salads made from raw fruits. \n\n产出：4.

LanguageData.CookMealSimple.label: cook simple meal
LanguageData.CookMealSimple.description: Cooks a simple meal from basic ingredients. \n\n产出：1.

LanguageData.CookMealSimpleCampfire.description: Cooks a simple meal from basic ingredients. \n\n产出：1.

LanguageData.CookMealSimple_Bulk.description: Cooks 4 simple meals from basic ingredients.
LanguageData.CookMealFine.label: cook fine meal
LanguageData.CookMealFine.description: Cooks a somewhat complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. \n\n产出：1.
LanguageData.CookMealFine_Bulk.label: cook fine meals (x4)
LanguageData.CookMealFine_Bulk.description: Cooks somewhat complex meals from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. \n\n产出：4.
LanguageData.CookMealLavish.label: cook lavish meal
LanguageData.CookMealLavish.description: Cooks a very complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. \n\n产出：1.
LanguageData.CookMealLavish_Bulk.label: cook lavish meals (x4)
LanguageData.CookMealLavish_Bulk.description: Cooks very complex meals from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. \n\n产出：4.
LanguageData.CookMealLuxury.label: cook luxury meal
LanguageData.CookMealLuxury.description: Cooks a luxurious meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Some ingredients are wasted as only the finest will do. \n\n产出：1.
LanguageData.CookMealLuxury_Bulk.label: cook luxury meals (x4)
LanguageData.CookMealLuxury_Bulk.description: Cooks Luxurious meals from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Some ingredients are wasted as only the finest will do. \n\n产出：4.
LanguageData.MakeTofu.label: press tofu
LanguageData.MakeTofu.description: Turns beans into tofu. Tofu is used in place of meat in meals or can be eaten raw. \n\n产出：5.
LanguageData.MakeVegetables.label: cook fried assorts
LanguageData.MakeVegetables.description: Prepares a simple dried assortment of vegetables. \n\n产出：1.
LanguageData.BakePotato.label: bake potato
LanguageData.BakePotato.description: Prepares baked potatoes from raw potatoes. \n\n产出：4.
LanguageData.HalfCoconut.label: split coconuts
LanguageData.HalfCoconut.description: Splits coconuts into two and harvests the milk from the fruit. \n\n产出：5.
LanguageData.CookMealSurvival.label: cook packaged survival meal
LanguageData.CookMealSurvival.description: Cooks a packaged survival meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.
